concurrent_primes

Class ConcurrentPrimes

  • java.lang.Object
    • concurrent_primes.ConcurrentPrimes

  • public class ConcurrentPrimes
extends java.lang.Object
    A program for finding all primes up to some number using several threads simultaneously
